channel.title: Running the server and getting on with client
channel.description:
well im using a 508 source i have the client that goes with the server i run the server and then when i try to trun the client ' i get this error that has to do with the cache or server being offline with it isnt and i know i have the cache in the right place
this is the error i get
error_game_js5io
with means a bad cache or servers offline and im sure it none of those is there another reason
like having my server connect wioth the client do i have to change something
Btw this is my first 508 source im using help me please and thank you
